headline: Three Reasons to Avoid HII and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Shareholders of Huntington Ingalls would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 24.1% and now trades at $187.80. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
